definition: any of various North American plants of the genus Liatris having racemes or panicles of small discoid flower heads
details:
noun
- any of various North American plants of the genus Liatris having racemes or panicles of small discoid flower heads
= synonyms: blazing star
- a plant of the genus Sanicula having palmately compound leaves and unisexual flowers in panicled umbels followed by bristly fruit
= synonyms: sanicle
